newsitem.title: UK: LASMO indicated higher after results.
newsitem.headline: LASMO indicated higher after results.

text.p: Shares in LASMO Plc were indicated higher on Thursday after the British oil exploration company said it nearly doubled its profits in 1996.
The shares were up 6-1/2p to 245-1/2p in pre-market dealings at 0811 GMT.
LASMO posted profits of 67 million stg, helped by the unexpected strength of oil prices and internal cost controls
Dealers said the share price was also buoyed by the company's statement that reserve additions would more than replace 1997 production.
Shares in other oil exploration companies were flat to narrowly mixed. --London newsroom +44 171 542 5106
